Class AbstractMatrix<V extends Vector>

java.lang.Object
  com.googlecode.array4j.AbstractMatrix<V>
All Implemented Interfaces:
Matrix, java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
AbstractDenseMatrix, AbstractPackedMatrix
public abstract class AbstractMatrix<V extends Vector>
extends java.lang.Object
implements Matrix

Abstract base class for matrices.
